explains: n. 剧变；厌恶；强烈反感；抽回

sentences.en: I started to feel a revulsion against their decadent lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 我对他们那腐朽的生活方式开始感到厌恶。

sentences.en: Most people viewed the bombings with revulsion.
sentences.cn: 大多数人对爆炸事件表现出惊恐不安。

sentences.en: She felt a deep sense of revulsion at the violence.
sentences.cn: 她对这一暴行深恶痛绝。
